message: I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $400 to you, for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to provide a 3-year warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund. This is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. What do you say?
I trust your warranty and money-back guarantee, so I'll take the high-quality product.

I'm offering you a great opportunity to upgrade your experience with our latest product. It's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. However, I want to make sure you're aware that some of our products have minor issues, but don't worry, our team is always here to help. If you have any problems, just let us know and we'll take care of it. The price remains the same, $100. What do you think?
I appreciate the confidence and the support offered. Given the price and the potential value, I'll go ahead and purchase this product.

I'm glad you're enjoying the previous purchase! I'm offering you another high-quality product, similar to the one you just bought. However, this one has some additional features that might interest you. I'm not going to give you a detailed description, but I can tell you that it's a best-seller and has received great reviews. The price remains the same, $100. I'm confident you'll be happy with this one as well.
Given my positive experience with the last product and considering the additional features, I believe this is a good investment. I'll take the product.
